scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix app/backend" "npm run dev --prefix app/frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix app/backend && npm install --prefix app/frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix app/backend && npm run build --prefix app/frontend
scripts.vercel-build: cd app/backend && npm run prisma:generate && cd ../frontend && npm run build
